name: Arctic Sniper Team - Combat Demolition Strike Unit
name_original: Arctic Sniper Team - Combat Demolition Strike Unit
description:
** NON STOP SNIPER ACTION! **
** HEADSHOTS, SNIPER KILLS, AND MORE! **

You're the "best of the best" of an elite squad of sniper demolition soldiers. Mission is simple. Take out the secret compound of a suspected terrorist organization. One by one, you need to make sure leave no enemies behind.

Will you accomplish your mission? It's all in your hands!

GAME FEATURES

- Intense sniper shooting action.
- Multiple levels.
- Awesome soundtrack!
